title: 19th-Century Chateau Escape in the French Countryside
description: Just two and a half hours north of Paris, you’ll discover historic elegance in the quaint countryside of Tilques at Najeti Hôtel Château Tilques. Built in 1891 and offering authentic French country charm, you’ll truly unwind with a three, four or seven-night escape that includes daily breakfast, a decadent three-course dinner, welcome glass of Champagne on arrival and more.
